title: HB Wallet

content: Spring Airdrop is a community appreciation event hosted by Bacoor Inc. this February 2023.‚ÑπÔ∏è Event name: Spring Airdrop‚è∞ Time: Jan.31, 2023 ‚Üí Feb.28, 2023 at 23:59 (GMT+9)üëâ Event Link: https://crew3.xyz/c/keyringpro/  üî• Prize:100 BUSD in totalü•á 1st Prize ‚Äì 50 BUSDüßß 10 other Prizes ‚Äì 5 BUSD eachüèÜ Winners: Users with highest XP on the Leaderboard will win the prizes(*) More details: https://keyring.app/spring-airdrop(*) Demo video: https://youtu.be/_3wIzkjacOE

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: Why are you promoting this website and are you a team member of the website? or your purpose is to promote your referral link. If you are doing this to promote your referral link then you are doing wrong because referral link promotion is not allowed in this forum. And if you come to promote this site you can run a bounty campaign by the legal way in the Bounty Altcoin section

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: You know OP, you are not prohibited from promoting an airdrops here on the forum platform, that's fine especially if it's legitimate. But as @ coinerer said you are breaking one of the rules and policies of this forum if you include your referral link in promoting these Airdrops.So it's best to remove your referral link from this post so you don't get into trouble, have a good day.

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: Quote from: gunhell16 on February 03, 2023, 04:12:09 AMYou know OP, you are not prohibited from promoting an airdrops here on the forum platform, that's fine especially if it's legitimate. But as @ coinerer said you are breaking one of the rules and policies of this forum if you include your referral link in promoting these Airdrops.So it's best to remove your referral link from this post so you don't get into trouble, have a good day.He should move this topic to¬† altcoin announcements or bounty altcoins section, not just remove the refer link. Because the Altcoin Discussion board is only for discussing Altcoins.¬† It is not right to promote any new project or share any link of income here. Or if it's an irrelevant post then the op should lock the topic
